thread.title: Nancy Squires is Named a Finalist in the Baltimore SMARTCEO’s Award for 2015 Circle Of Excellence
thread.title_full: Nancy Squires is Named a Finalist in the Baltimore SMARTCEO’s Award for 2015 Circle Of Excellence

author: Apurva Shah
title: Nancy Squires is Named a Finalist in the Baltimore SMARTCEO’s Award for 2015 Circle Of Excellence
text:
The Baltimore SmartCEO announced Nancy Squires, Founder and CEO of The Squires Group, Inc. (TSGi), as one of the finalists to be honored for business excellence in SmartCEO’s Circle of Excellence program. The Circle of Excellence program recognizes the area’s most accomplished business leaders for their industry impact and market leadership. The 2015 Circle of Excellence finalists collectively generate more than $837 million in revenue and employ 3,415 individuals in the Greater Baltimore Area. “The Circle of Excellence finalists are shaping the future of Baltimore’s business community and ensuring the sustainability, safety and efficiency of our community for years to come,” says Jaime Nespor-Zawmon, President of SmartCEO Events. “We proudly recognize their successes and contributions, and we believe that their impact will make a difference for customers and clients across the nation.”
“It is very meaningful for me to be included in the list of finalists as we celebrate our 20th Anniversary. When I reflect back on my decision to start The Squires Group 20 years ago, the one thing that has consistently guided me over the years has been our vision – to be the most trusted talent solutions partner for our clients and consultants. This vision has guided me in making many key decisions--like who to hire, what specialty areas to focus on and which companies to partner with,” says Nancy Squires. “The first 20 years in the business have been incredible. I share the credit of making it to this list with my business partner, Eric Galasso (President of TSGi), the wonderful team we have in place to deliver service to clients and consultants, and our consultants who continuously strive to deliver on our client’s goals and mission.”
This year’s finalists will be profiled in the November/ December issue of Baltimore SmartCEO magazine and celebrated at an awards ceremony on November 17, 2015 at the Baltimore Harbor Hotel.
About SmartCEO
SmartCEO’s mission is to educate and inspire the business community through its award winning magazine, connections at C-level events and access to valuable online resources. SmartCEO’s integrated media platforms reach decision makers in the Baltimore, New York, Philadelphia and Washington, DC, metropolitan areas.
About The Squires Group, Inc.
The Squires Group, Inc. (TSGi) is a WBENC certified woman-owned, professional services firm founded in 1994 by Nancy Squires, with its principal operations located in Annapolis, Maryland. TSGi specializes in providing talent solutions in ERP, IT, Cyber and Accounting & Finance to its clients. TSGi provides short to long-term services, for mid to tier-one commercial and Federal clients throughout the Mid-Atlantic region and select national markets. For more information on The Squires Group, please visit http://www.squiresgroup.com .
